definitions.definition: The art or occupation of a mason.
definitions.example: He studied masonry for five years.

definitions.definition: The work or performance of a mason
That which is built by a mason; anything constructed of the materials used by masons, such as stone, brick, tiles, or the like. Dry masonry is applied to structures made without mortar.
The craft, institution, or mysteries of Freemasons; Freemasonry.
